question:
You and your friends ate a meal at a restaurant to celebrate a special occasion, and you were very pleased with the food and service.

Write a letter to the restaurant manager. In your letter:

Give details of your visit to the restaurant
Explain the reason for the celebration
Say what you liked about the food or service
Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am writing to thank you for the decent meal that we ate at your restaurant yesterday.I also thank you for the nice service you provided, and I wish all the success to you and your crew.

My name is Jay. Yesterday at 2:00 P.M, we reserved table number 6 at your restaurant to celebrate my birthday with my family and my close friends. However, we all live 30 miles away from your place, we were happy to drive long distances to eat at your special restaurant.

Let me describe what we liked. Firstly, the food was tasty and delicious so much that we ate so much. Secondly, the service was absolutely perfect and the chairs were comfortable and clean. In addition, the bathroom was clean. Thirdly, the drinks and desserts were unique. Finally, the price was very convenient if compared with other places like yours. I will never hesitate to come back and enjoy the food that your place is serving.
I appreciate the kind of service that you and your staff are providing.
